meanings.definition: The study of the origins and meanings of words.
meanings.sent1: In onomatologies, researchers explore how words came to have their meanings.
meanings.sent2: Scholars in onomatologies analyze the history and significance of words.
meanings.sent3: The onomatologies class had fun uncovering the stories behind different words.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for onomatologies turned language into a treasure trove of secrets.
meanings.sent5: Through onomatologies, the hidden tales within words reveal themselves.

meanings.definition: The branch of linguistics that deals with the study of words and their meanings.
meanings.sent1: Linguists specializing in onomatologies investigate how words convey meanings.
meanings.sent2: The onomatologies department focuses on the relationship between words and meanings.
meanings.sent3: During the onomatologies lecture, students giggled at funny word origins.
meanings.sent4: In the vast forest of language, onomatologies acts as a guide to understanding.
meanings.sent5: The onomatologies course illuminated the intricate dance of words and meanings.

meanings.definition: The study of the formation and development of words.
meanings.sent1: Through onomatologies, we explore how words evolve and take shape.
meanings.sent2: The onomatologies workshop delved into the creation process of new words.
meanings.sent3: The onomatologies project traced the growth of language over centuries.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of vocabulary, onomatologies nurtures the seeds of new words.
meanings.sent5: The onomatologies research shed light on the birth and growth of language.
